content: azalea offset shell cowl by darlene r joyce materials 1 skein of louisa har- ding azalea size h 5 0 mm hook chain on 40 sts row 1 rs skip 3ch 1 double_crochet in next 4ch *skip 2ch 5dc into next chain ch2 skip 3ch 1 double_crochet into each of the next 5 chain repeat from * to end row 2 ch3 skip first st 1 double_crochet into each of the next 4 sts *skip 2ch 5dc into next double_crochet ch2 skip 4dc 1dc into each of the next 5 sts repeat from * to end repeat row 2 for pa cid 1 ern work un cid 1 l all yarn is used sew chain on edge and ending edge together form a ring abbrevia cid 1 ons chain-chain double_crochet-double_crochet st s -s cid 1 tch es © 2015 mosaic yarn studio ltd 109 w prospect ave mount prospect il 60056 www mosaicyarnstudio com all rights reserved
